Title: Serviced w/Chain~1950s~Wittnauer Revue-Longines Swiss 17J~10KGF Pocket Watch
Description: PLEASE LOOK AT ALL DETAILED PICTURES, AND READ THE ENTIRE WRITTEN DESCRIPTION AND THEN ASK ANY QUESTIONS YOU HAVE SERVICED AND WORKING WITTNAUER REVUE - LONGINES POCKET WATCH IN 10K GOLD FILLED CASE ~ INCLUDES GOLD FILLED CURB WATCH CHAIN AND AWARD FOB. THE MOVEMENT WAS FULLY SERVICED (REMOVED FROM THE CASE, COMPLETELY DIS-ASSEMBLED, HYDROSONICALLY CLEANED-RINSED-DRIED. EACH PART INSPECTED, WORN OR DAMAGED PARTS HAVE BEEN REPLACED. THE PARTS WERE LUBRICATED, AND THE MOVEMENT RE-ASSEMBLED, OBSERVED. ADJUSTED AND TIMED). THE CASE WAS INSPECTED AND LIGHTLY CLEANED. ================================ CIRCA 1950S ~ 42.5MM (1-11/16") LONGINES-WITTNAUER REVUE- SWISS OPEN FACE 10K GOLD FILLED POCKET WATCH. POWERED BY A WITTNAUER WATCH CO. SIGNED ~17 JEWEL ~CALIBER REVUE 17T. PENDANT WIND AND SET OPEN FACE CASE ORIENTED 3/4 PLATE MOVEMENT. "17T REVUE" CALIBER DESIGNATION STAMPED ON PLATE. THIS PREMIUM GRADE CALIBER FEATURES RAISED GOLD JEWEL SETTINGS. OPERATING AT 18000 BEATS PER HOUR AND STORING A 40 + HOUR POWER RESERVE. THE MOVEMENT HAS BEEN FULLY SERVICED, INSPECTED AND TIMED. DIAL: WITTNAUER REVUE SIGNED 37MM SLIGHTLY DOMED CREAM TONED DIAL. APPLIED GOLD HOUR MARKERS. POLISHED GOLD SWORD STYLED HOUR, MINUTE AND SUB-SECONDS HANDS. VERY LIGHT AND EVEN PATINA - OTHER WISE PERFECT DIAL. PLEASE SEE PICTURES CASE 42.5MM (1-11/16") DIAMETER 10K GOLD FILLED 3 PART OPEN FACE WATCH CASE (measured without crown). COIN EDGED (OR SLOTTED) CASE IS A SKINNY 8.5 MM THICK (WITH CASE BACK AND DOMED CRYSTAL). ONLY VERY LIGHT WEAR ON SLOTTED CASE EDGE. NO SCRATCHES - NO REPAIRS OR DENTS. NO BRASSING. LIGHT WEAR ON HOOP AND CROWN.SMOOTH SNAP DOWN BEZEL IS CLEAN. LITTLE TO NO WEAR ON SURFACES. SEATS FLAT AND TIGHT TO CASE. IT HOLDS DOMED REAL GLASS CRYSTAL TIGHT. NO SCRATCHES ON CLEAN AND CLEAR CRYSTAL , NO CHIPS, OR CRACKS.SMOOTH CASE BACK IN EXTRA FINE CONDITION. IT SNAPS DOWN FLAT AND TIGHT. A FEW SMALL AND LIGHT SCRATCHES NOTICED ON SMOOTH EXTERIOR SURFACE. ONE TINY DING NOTICED. SIGNED AND NUMBERED INNER SURFACE. CHAIN:CURB LINK STYLED GOLD PLATED WATCH CHAIN MEASURES ABOUT 10". CHAINS LINKS ARE A BIT OVER 5/32" (4.5MM) THICK . LIGHT TO MODERATE WEAR NOTICED ON SURFACES - NO DAMAGE OR SIGNS OF REPAIR. SWIVEL SECURES WATCH TO CHAIN, ENAMELED GOLD PLATED BOWLING AWARD FOB ON OPPOSITE END. "AL '33" ENGRAVED ON BACK SIDE . COMMENTS: VERY NICE 1950S LONGINES- WITTNAUER REVUE SWISS POCKET WATCH!
